Articles.Content: so i was at jool trying to get my orbit at about 100k or so and suddenly my craft implodes for no reason at all, anyone ever experience this before?
Did it fall to pieces or actually explode? I've had three ships simply fall apart on me in a definitely buggy way. Space Kraken Jr?
Hi decemberstorm, are you throttling up to maximum with the new large engine? If so, watch your G meter, if it gets too high your craft will collapse under the load.
